Question
========

A tub of margarine usually weighs 250 grams. The European standard is that a maximum of 5% of all tubs may weigh less than 245 grams. Suppose that the weights of tubs of Becel margarine are normally distributed with a standard deviation of 7 grams. Does the average weight meet the European standard?

Answerlist
----------

* Yes
* No

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Yes: Correct
* No: Incorrect
